title: Designing Multi-Interaction Collaborative Activities for Building Online Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platforms and foundational work experience in specialized professional fields
context.additional_context: Developing collaborative learning strategies in offline environments using digital devices, targeting professionals aged 40+.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the mechanisms of online community-building consciousness through text/audio/video-based collaborative activities.
Learners can design a peer-to-peer knowledge-sharing system using multi-interaction tools.
Learners can develop an online collaboration model applicable to real-world work environments through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
